children.text: Unwaxed lemons add a hit of citrus to lemon drizzle cakes, biscuits and tarts, as well as summery pastas and grain salads.
Juicy seedless easy peelers are perfect for at-home snacking or adding to lunchboxes for citrus sunshine on the go.
Enjoy sweet, tart pineapple as at as it is or baked into an upside-down cake. For a delicious twist, chop into a salsa with lime, chilli and coriander to serve with fish or barbecued chicken.
